Frequently Asked Questions

Quick answers to common questions about Kottravai

How can I become a Kottravai artisan?

We welcome women from rural areas who are interested in learning traditional crafts. Contact us through our mentorship program to learn about training opportunities.

What products do you offer?

We offer a wide range of handcrafted products including coconut shell crafts, textiles, pottery, jewelry, organic food products, and home decor items.

Do you ship internationally?

Yes, we ship our products worldwide. Shipping costs and delivery times vary by location. Contact us for specific shipping information.

How do you ensure product quality?

All our products go through rigorous quality checks. Our artisans are trained to maintain high standards, and each product is inspected before shipping.

Can I visit your facilities?

Yes, we welcome visitors to our head office and training centers. Please contact us in advance to schedule a visit.

How can I support the movement?

You can support us by purchasing our products, spreading awareness, becoming a mentor, or partnering with us for corporate social responsibility initiatives.

She’s building her future.
Thank you for being a part of it.

At Kottravai, every interaction is more than a message.
It’s a bridge — between cities and villages, between questions and action, between intention and impact.
Thank you for reaching out.
